mapper.select: select * from student where name = #{name} and classno = #{classno}
mapper.insert: insert into student values ( seq_stdno.nextval, #{name}, #{age}, #{height}, #{classno}, TO_DATE(#{birth},'MM-DD-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), #{address}, #{image}, #{gender}, #{parentno}, #{personalid}, #{likeid}, #{hateid} )
mapper.update: update student set stdno = #{personID} where rownum = 1
